doc:
Jim Davis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Davis_(actor) 0 Jim Davis (born Marlin Davis, August 26, 1909 – April 26, 1981) was an American actor, best known for his role as Jock Ewing in the CBS prime-time soap opera, Dallas, a role which continued until he was too ill from a terminal illness to perform. Jim_Davis ( born Marlin_Davis , August_26_,_1909 – April_26 , 1981 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_role as Jock_Ewing in the_CBS_prime-time_soap_opera , Dallas , a_role which continued until he was too ill from a_terminal_illness to_perform .
